and
N.S. (Mother) and J.C. (Father), Appellants-Respondents,
v.
The Indiana Department of Child Services, Appellee-Petitioner Court of Appeals Case No. 85A02-1710-JT-2386 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED February 13, 2018

CRONE , J.
